messages.subject: Newbie with a simple question.....
messages.msgSnippet: There is some evidence that lice actually *prefer* clean hair... something about natural oils being much more difficult for nits to stick to. I read that
messages.messageBody:
"There is some evidence that lice actually *prefer* clean hair...
something about natural oils being much more difficult for nits to
stick to."

I read that too.
It also makes it harder for them to bite you, the oil acts as a
natural barrier. Oils suffocate lice, that's why we used olive oil as
a treatment when we had a round of lice here recently. Jalen was most
likely the carrier, because he's little and lays on floors etc...

Being dirty is not a health hazard, it just makes life more pleasant
when people smell nice.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
